Title: Relates to discounted admission and memberships for certain individuals
Summary: Requires any person, firm, partnership, corporation, or association, or agent or employee thereof, which offers, in the regular course of business, an established senior citizen, student or veteran discount on the price of admission or membership thereto, to offer a discount on the price of admission or membership to disabled individuals.
LawCode: Ren ยง396-cc to be ยง396-ccc, add ยง396-cccc, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to discounted admission and memberships for certain individuals
